name: The Journey Home (itch) (CottonSocks)
description:
Hello there! I have made my first game called The Journey Home. A PC game where you have become separated from your home because of a war between Waterdrops/Raindrops and the Fireballs. Now you have to avoid the Waterdrops while flying home. Please let me know if you liked the game, feed me some critique aswell!

7+ or younger or all ages :)
